text: A bata masɛnsɛnna ti, a Yerusalɛn suxu. A yɛngɛ so seene rafalama nɛn naxanye taan so dɛɛne kalɛ, a yamarin fi a taa yi kaane xa halagi, a ganla yi yɛngɛ so sɔnxɔni te. A yɛngɛ so seene rasigama nɛn taan so dɛɛne xili ma, a gbingbin gbeen nafala taan yinna xɔn, a sanganso makantanxine ti taan nabilinni a yɛngɛ feen na.
